alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact southeastern Robeson through 730 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hestertown, or near Lumberton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Fairmont, Fair Bluff, Boardman, Butters, Hestertown, Barnesville, Evergreen, Marietta, Proctorville, Orrum and Southeastern Regional Medical Center. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 16 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
